issue.title: [C++] Rename UnionArray::type_ids to UnionArray::type_codes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7279](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7279). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would be consistent with `UnionType::type_codes`. Furthermore, "type_id" already means something else in the C++ API, so it would be less confusing as well.
